label: tdcosmo_slacs_birrer_2020
notes: This is an approximately-Gaussian external constraint encoded as an H0_grid posterior for use by probe.name=h0_grid.
For space='ln' we interpret the published symmetric sigma in linear H0 units and use sigma_ln≈sigma/mean.

reference.note: Constraint reported for the combined TDCOSMO+SLACS analysis; asymmetric errors approximated symmetrically for this stress-test.
reference.title: TDCOSMO IV. Hierarchical time-delay cosmography: mass models and H0
